content.body:
Dear John Smith,

The status of your MIA for EuroStar has been updated.

* Your bank reference: EuroStar bridge
* Current status: Acknowledged
* Previous status: Submitted
* Updated by: Joe Bloggs (Joe.Bloggs@example.com)

Sign in to our service for more information: 
https://www.test.service.gov.uk/

With regards,

The Digital Trade Finance Service team

Email: test@test.gov.uk
Phone: +44 (0)202 123 4567
Opening times: Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm (excluding public holidays)
content.subject: Status update: EuroStar bridge
